p: Pure standards for GC-MS analysis were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO) and Extrasynthese (Lyon, France). Glutamate, morphine, Tween 80 (polyoxyethylene sorbitan monooleate), and dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO) were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO). All salts used in physiological solution, sucrose, glucose and NaOH, were purchased from Vetec (Rio de Janeiro, Brazil). HEPES [4-(2-hydroxyethyl)-1-piperazineethanesulfonic acid] was acquired from Amresco (Solon, OH).
